changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.permettant d'envoyer un sms à un numéro: allowing you to send an SMS to a personalized number without having to create the contact's order
changelog.md.Cela permet d'envoyer un sms à un numéro: This allows you to send an sms to a number obtained via an info command from another device under Jeedom for example
changelog.md.Attention, aucune vérification du numéro: Attention, no verification of the number is carried out, you must provide the numbers in international format
changelog.md.Désactivation du flow control lors de la: Disabling flow control when connecting to the modem to avoid problems with certain modems (for example lixee modem
changelog.md.Fix un problème avec certaines clés gsm: Fix an issue with some gsm keys returning incorrect characters when starting the daemon
changelog.md.Mise à jour liste des commandes pour Jee: Update command list for Jeedom v4.3
changelog.md.Nouvelle présentation de la liste des ob: New presentation of the list of objects
changelog.md.Passage à l'interface jeedom v4: Switching to the jeedom v4 interface
changelog.md.Amélioration de la vérification du numér: Improved verification of the sender number
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug si le niveau de log: Correction of a bug if the log level is none

index.md.Le plugin SMS permet de dialoguer avec J: The SMS plugin allows you to interact with Jeedom via SMS
index.md.Il permet également à Jeedom de vous env: It also allows Jeedom to send you an SMS in the event of an alert (alarm plugin, scenario, etc
index.md.Pour dialoguer avec Jeedom, il faut avoi: To interact with Jeedom, you must have configured interactions
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il suffi: After downloading the plugin, just activate it and configure the port
index.md.Après sauvegarde le démon devrait se lan: After saving the demon should launch
index.md.Le plugin est déjà configuré par défaut,: The plugin is already configured by default, so you don't have to do anything more
index.md.Cependant vous pouvez modifier cette con: However you can modify this configuration, here is the detail
index.md.le port USB sur lequel votre clef GSM es: the USB port on which your GSM key is connected (for example it can be /dev/ttyUSB0, to see it just run `dmesg` then plug in the modem
index.md.Si vous ne savez pas quel port USB est u: If you do not know which USB port is used, you can simply indicate "Auto
index.md.Attention le mode auto ne marche qu'avec: Please note that the auto mode only works with Huawei E220 keys
index.md.Attention certaines clefs 3G sont en mod: Please note that some 3G keys are in modem mode by default and not GSM
index.md.Il faut, à l'aide du logiciel de votre f: You must, using the software of your key manufacturer, change the mode of the key to GSM (or text, or serial
index.md.Vous avez la possibilité de passer en 96: You have the option of switching to 9600 baud in case your equipment requires it
index.md.Permet d'indiquer le code pin de la cart: Allows you to indicate the pin code of the SIM card, to leave empty if you do not have one
index.md.Mode de compatibilité étendu, à n'utilis: Extended compatibility mode, to be used only if sending and / or receiving messages does not work
index.md.Indique le nombre de caractères maximum: Indicates the maximum number of characters per text message
index.md.Passerelle SMS \/ SMS Gateway (modifier: SMS / SMS Gateway (modify in case of error
index.md.A ne changer que si vous avez l'erreur `: Only change if you have the error `CMS 330 SMSC number not set`, in this case you must indicate the SMS gateway number of your telephone operator
index.md.Force de réception du signal de votre cl: Signal strength of your GSM key
index.md.Réseau téléphonique de votre clef GSM (p: Telephone network of your GSM key (can be "None" if Jeedom cannot recover it
index.md.permet de modifier le port de communicat: allows to modify the internal communication port of the daemon
index.md.cycle de scrutation du démon pour l'envo: daemon scan cycle for sending and receiving SMS
index.md.Un chiffre trop bas peut amener à une ce: Too low a number can lead to instability
index.md.La configuration des équipements SMS est: The configuration of SMS devices is accessible from the Plugins → Communication menu
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.En dessous vous retrouvez quelques param: Below you find some specific parameters
index.md.permet d'interdire les interactions pour: allows you to prohibit interactions for all the numbers of this equipment (if you want to prohibit interactions for certain numbers and not for others, you can create several equipment
index.md.permet d'accepter les messages en proven: Allows you to accept messages from unknown numbers
index.md.Le message reçu ainsi que le numéro de l: The message received as well as the number of the sender will be available via the commands as for any other message
index.md.Les interactions sont toujours désactivé: Interactions are always disabled for these numbers
index.md.permet d'ajouter automatiquement le numé: allows you to automatically add the number to the list of orders (therefore to create a new order) when receiving a message from an unknown number
index.md.Cette option peut être dangereuse à util: This option can be dangerous to use because it will automatically add a corresponding command to the number when receiving a message from an unknown number
index.md.Si sur le même équipement vous activez l: If on the same equipment you activate interactions, this means that anyone can start interacting with your Jeedom
index.md.N'activez cette option que si vous êtes: Activate this option only if you are certain to accept this risk
